    TITLE TODO

    geom_fields.Rd

    DESCRIPTION TODO

    GeomFields

geom_fields(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "fields",
  position = "identity",
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  max_length = ggplot2::unit(0.5, "cm"),
  .angle_correction = angle_correction,
  arrow = grid::arrow(length = ggplot2::unit(0.1, "cm")),
  inherit.aes = TRUE,
  ...
)

    Format

    An object of class GeomFields (inherits from GeomSegment, Geom, ggproto, gg) of length 8.

    Value

    TODO

    Details

    DETAILS TODO

    Author

    Pepijn de Vries

    Examples

    data(seawatervelocity)

if (requireNamespace("ggplot2") && requireNamespace("stars")) {
  library(ggplot2)
  library(stars)
  
  sw_df <- as.data.frame(seawatervelocity)
  sw_df$uo <- as.numeric(sw_df$uo)
  sw_df$vo <- as.numeric(sw_df$vo)
  ggplot(sw_df, aes(x = x, y = y, length = pythagoras(vo, uo), angle = atan2(uo, vo))) +
    geom_fields(max_length = unit(0.5, "cm"))
  
  ggplot() +
    geom_fields(data    = seawatervelocity,
                mapping = aes(length = pythagoras(vo, uo),
                              angle = atan2(uo, vo),
                              col = pythagoras(vo, uo)),
                max_length = unit(0.5, "cm")) +
    scale_colour_viridis_c() +
    theme_light()
}
